database.name: VIEW ESCM_MATERIAL_REQ_ISSUANCE_V
database.view: SELECT mira.escm_material_request_id AS escm_material_req_issuance_v_id, mira.specno, mira.escm_material_request_id AS related_mir_id, mira.documentno, mira.transaction_date, mira.ad_client_id, mira.ad_org_id, mira.isactive, mira.created, mira.createdby, mira.updated, mira.updatedby FROM escm_material_request mira
